Great game, I really suggest playing it.
Essentially the same thing as Counter-Strike but now also included a single-player campaign that can be played.
Why not make this game 2/3 eus? Best one without hackers/lamers

+More realistic in terms of actual guns
+More options than the rest of the Counter Strike Series (Night Vision, Shield, etc)
+Bots are actually challenging (unlike CSGO where if you want challenging bots you need to go Extreme mode)
+A lot more maps
- AN ACTUAL GOOD FUCKING MINIMAP

Meh, 7/10. Could have been 10/10 and better than CSGO but the Minimap just made it a lot worse.

(for context the Minimap in all Counter Strike Games are supposed to display diffrent Bomb sites, Hostage Release points, etc. But all it shows in CS:CZ is your teammates location. Yeah its supposed to be more realistic but when you make a game too realistic it dosent become fun.)
This game is like Eris. But i recomended.
